languages.text: "Прежде смерти рожденные, не ведали Они небытия. Потому, Владыка, вверяю в несмертную стражу себе одну из сих темниц. Пока явствует Йекхмет, явствует крепость ее".

traits.locale_text: "Владыка, ты вверил в несмертную стражу себе одну из этих темниц. Исторгни забвение изреченных истин, ибо в них вечность нашего народа".

languages.text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."
languages.original_text: "Прежде смерти рожденные, не ведали Они небытия. Потому, Владыка, вверяю в несмертную стражу себе одну из сих темниц. Пока явствует Йекхмет, явствует крепость ее".

traits.locale_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmets endure, so too will its impregnable walls endure."

"Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmets endure, so too will its impregnable walls endure."

"Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

languages.text: «Nacidos antes de la muerte, no conocían la inexistencia. Por eso, mi Señor, dejo en vuestra inmortal vigilancia una de sus prisiones. Pues mientras los Yekhmet resistan, también lo harán sus inexpugnables murallas».
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

traits.locale_text: «Nacidos antes de la muerte, no conocían la inexistencia. Por eso, mi Señor, dejo en vuestra inmortal vigilancia una de sus prisiones. Pues mientras los Yekhmet resistan, también lo harán sus inexpugnables murallas».

languages.text: « Nés avant la mort elle-même, Ils ne connaissaient pas l'inexistence. Ainsi, mon seigneur, je place entre vos mains immortelles l'une de ces prisons. Ces murs imprenables perdureront aussi longtemps que les Yekhmets. »
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

traits.locale_text: « Nés avant la mort elle-même, Ils ne connaissaient pas l'inexistence. Ainsi, mon seigneur, je place entre vos mains immortelles l'une de ces prisons. Ces murs imprenables perdureront aussi longtemps que les Yekhmets. »

languages.text: 「死そのもの以前に生まれた彼らは、破滅とは無縁の存在でした。主よ、そのために私はこの監獄の一つをあなたの不滅なる監督のもとに置くのです。イェクメトが存続する限り、その難攻不落の壁も残るでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

traits.locale_text: 「死そのもの以前に生まれた彼らは、破滅とは無縁の存在でした。主よ、そのために私はこの監獄の一つをあなたの不滅なる監督のもとに置くのです。イェクメトが存続する限り、その難攻不落の壁も残るでしょう」

languages.text: “他们诞生时尚未有死亡的概念，他们对湮灭也一无所知。正因如此，我的主，我将其中一座监狱交由您永久保管。只要叶赫迈特王朝岿然不动，那坚不可摧的城墙也同样会屹立不倒。”
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

traits.locale_text: “他们诞生时尚未有死亡的概念，他们对湮灭也一无所知。正因如此，我的主，我将其中一座监狱交由您永久保管。只要叶赫迈特王朝岿然不动，那坚不可摧的城墙也同样会屹立不倒。”

languages.text: "Geboren vor dem Tod selbst war ihnen die Inexistenz völlig fremd. Daher, Herr, lege ich eines dieser Gefängnisse in Eure unsterbliche Obhut. So lange die Yekhmet überdauert, überdauern auch ihre uneinnehmbaren Wände."
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."

traits.locale_text: "Geboren vor dem Tod selbst war ihnen die Inexistenz völlig fremd. Daher, Herr, lege ich eines dieser Gefängnisse in Eure unsterbliche Obhut. So lange die Yekhmet überdauern, überdauern auch seine uneinnehmbaren Wände."

languages.text: "Ölümün bile öncesinde doğmuşlardı, olmamaya yabancıydılar. Bu yüzden de Lordum, bu hapishanelerin bir tanesini sizin ebedî gözcülüğünüze emanet ediyorum. Nihayetinde Yekhmetler var olduğu sürece onların aşılamaz duvarları da var olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Born before death itself, They were strangers to inexistence. Therefore, my Lord, I place one of these prisons in your immortal custody. For as long as the Yekhmet endures, so too will its impregnable walls."
